SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.rmi

Class RmiClient

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.rmi.RmiClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientCommands, VirtualClient, Serializable, Remote
public class RmiClient extends UnicastRemoteObject implements VirtualClient, ClientCommands
The RmiClient class represents a remote client that interacts with a virtual server using RMI (Remote Method Invocation) protocol. It implements the VirtualClient interface to allow the rmi server to call methods on the client via the RMI communication protocol. It implements also the ClientCommands interface which defines the methods that can be called from the tui on the client-side rmiClient.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • controller

      private IController controller
      This private variable represents an instance of the interface IController. It is used to send commands from the client to the IController on the server using the rmi communication protocol.

    • server

      private final VirtualServer server
      This private variable represents an instance of the interface VirtualServer. It is used to send commands from the client to the RmiServer on the server using the rmi communication protocol.

    • gameController

      private IGameController gameController
      This private variable represents an instance of the interface IGameController. It is used to send commands from the client to the GameController on the server using the rmi communication protocol.

      private Integer idGame
      The idGame of the current game the client is joined.

      The username with which the player is logged into the game.

      The ui that allows the player to interact with the game.

      Queue where the ClientQueueObject sent by the server are added

    • token

      public Token token
      Used to determine the connection with the server.

    • timer

      private final Timer timer
      Timer used to send the heartBeat.

    • ready

      private boolean ready
      Represents the player is ready to play or not. It is set to false by default.

  • Constructor Details

    • RmiClient

      public RmiClient(String ipaddress) throws RemoteException, NotBoundException
      Creates a new RmiClient object. The first connection with the server occurs and the reference to the virtualServer is saved in the server variable e notifies the server of the first connection. The tempToken generated by the server is saved which allows the server to identify this client until the username is set. The executor thread is started.
      Parameters:
      ipaddress - the IP address of the server to connect to
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote error occurs
      NotBoundException - if the specified name is not currently bound in the registry

    • drawGold

      public void drawGold(int index) throws RemoteException
      Method of the ClientCommands that send an object to the GameController of the type DrawGoldObj that tells the server the player draws a card from the deck.
      Specified by:
      drawGold in interface ClientCommands
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the card the player wants to draw. 0 if the player draws the card on the top od the deck. 1 if the player draws the first flipped card. 2 if the player draws the second flipped card. If a value other than these three an object of the type ShowInvalidActionObj is sent by the server.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in the remote communication

    • setToken

      public void setToken(int token, boolean temporary)
      Method of the ClientCommands that sets the token for authentication. If the token to be set is permanent write the token in a file. If the token is temporary then save it in a file. It is saved in a file to allow the player to reconnect to the game he was playing in case of disconnection
      Specified by:
      setToken in interface ClientCommands
      Parameters:
      token - the token value to be set
      temporary - if true, sets temporary token; otherwise, sets permanent token
      See Also:
      • Token
      • RmiClient
      • TCPClient

    • getToken

      public Token getToken()
      Method of the ClientCommands that return the token.
      Specified by:
      getToken in interface ClientCommands
      Returns:
      The token associated with the current instance.

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect(boolean reconnect) throws RemoteException
      Method of the ClientCommands that sends an object to the GameController of the type ReconnectObj that tells the server if the player wants to rejoin the game which he previously disconnected from.
      Specified by:
      reconnect in interface ClientCommands
      Parameters:
      reconnect - true to rejoin to the game which the player previously disconnected from , false to not rejoin.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a communication error with the server

    • sendHeartBeat

      private void sendHeartBeat() throws RemoteException
      This method sends to the controller the heart beat associated with the VirtualClient that is sending it
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the rmi communication

    • startHeartBeat

      public void startHeartBeat()
      This method starts the process that "sends" the heart beat periodically to the server A heart beat is sent immediately on the first execution and every 2 seconds after it
